sys_ux_client_script.name: Toggle Collapsed State to Closed

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_a16f4d7a0726301029a8f0269c1ed079
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Sales Order Items">b0a0fbd607e2301029a8f0269c1ed0bb</macroponent><name>Toggle Collapsed State to Closed</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    const state = api.state.listIsCollapsed;
    if (state) {
        api.setState('listIsCollapsed', false);
    }
    api.setState('listIsCollapsed', true);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-09-16 00:59:05</sys_created_on><sys_id>a16f4d7a0726301029a8f0269c1ed079</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Toggle Collapsed State to Closed</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Big Oil 2" source="x_683715_big_oil_2">828fcb8c0762301029a8f0269c1ed070</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Big Oil 2">828fcb8c0762301029a8f0269c1ed070</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_a16f4d7a0726301029a8f0269c1ed079</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-09-16 01:02:32</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
